question: How did the King test the prince and the princess?
choices: He told them to not go into a forbidden room
He gave them personality tests to see if they were the right fit for the throne

He asked them to come up with political programs that will benefit all the people in the kingdom to see how good they are at managing the kingdom

question: Which is true?
choices: The prince disobeyed the king, while the princess did not
The princess disobeyed the king, while the prince did not
